Fie recovers additional strain equal to the  force points generated.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <name>Balance</name> <number>TAL0001007</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 15:05:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a17ea12cdbe20c542901de90cf9619d2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 15:05:12</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
